summary: This document outlines a regulatory action against Richard Kahn for failing to provide testimony as requested by FINRA, resulting in a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless compliance is met within a specified timeframe. It includes details about the decision and the regulatory framework involved.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as a respondent in a regulatory action for failing to provide requested testimony to FINRA.

events.title: Regulatory Action Against Richard Kahn
events.description: Richard Kahn was permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership due to failure to provide testimony as requested by FINRA.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule 10.2(d) by failing to provide testimony as requested by FINRA.
The decision against Richard Kahn was issued on April 20, 2012.
Kahn is permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he provides testimony within 120 days.
The document references multiple URLs related to the regulatory action and decision.
